data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WdyRCC19SFgQ7kNvgGYwlao&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A5Ys4QcX729cAwxMZE7Sx-l&oh=00_AYB-b-Z0OF9oM8MrvhndK2eaXkgaKZWeNGno6wcJQaNiSg&oe=668CFACC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TbvtdM2pzpwQ7kNvgF9nx3P&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A5Ys4QcX729cAwxMZE7Sx-l&oh=00_AYAiXRsb75ViXstZD6xO3MZ4li28kY_n-xKSgpW6lC5LgA&oe=668D311F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=C565Dhsus3wQ7kNvgFOQH9Z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=A5Ys4QcX729cAwxMZE7Sx-l&oh=00_AYBiC7rWyGPGKReM0GOg5Qp2adcBoyNWu56J8-9IpruowQ&oe=668D1671)
